import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { }

Delicious food, desserts and fresh tea

ORDER

What should be done ?

1

Eat your meal with taste.

2

Enjoy tea and dessert after your meal.

3

Take lots of photos and enjoy
